about.title: About fund
about.description: We provide help and support to people in the most difficult life circumstances, strengthening their resilience and faith in their own strength. We strive to create a modern society that becomes stronger, more just and equal, where every person has the opportunity to live with dignity, receive the necessary support and realize their potential.

footer.discrIcons: Subscribe to support us and keep up with the latest news
